about_the_game: JTTPOT presents a set of ten original musical themes, with surrealistic VR supporting elements. All the visual and interactive elements are designed to follow the music. Together, the ten songs create an emotional journey through modern life, in the form of ten unique VR scenes. Each musical scene is intended to inspire different feelings and insights on different life experiences, with light user participation. They are diverse in topic. Each scene has interactivity in the form of surrealistic or symbolic participation in the journey. For example, in one scene the user witnesses the shattering of a magical prison made of ice. In another scene the user can travel through a maze that symbolizes old age and the end of life. The scenes thus lead the user through a deeply emotional VR experience.

short_description: In JTTPOT, users will experience a series of dreams in virtual reality. There are ten scenes, each of which features an original musical composition supported by simple, surreal imagery and limited casual gameplay. This creates a rich and exciting experience for the user, ideally suited for VR.
